description: Looks like the big trunkdoc merge didn't get everything, I'm seeing a 404 on http://nova.openstack.org/devref/index.html this morning.
title: Getting a 404 Not Found on Developer Guide at http://nova.openstack.org/devref/index.html

comments.content: Looks like the big trunkdoc merge didn't get everything, I'm seeing a 404 on http://nova.openstack.org/devref/index.html this morning.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~annegentle

comments.content: It builds in trunk using 'make html' and 'python setup.py build_sphinx'.  I think the issue isn't with the merge, but with what Hudson is doing after building it.  The likely culprit is that we never had directories before, and the deeper structure is causing problems.  I'll ping mtaylor on IRC about it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xtoddx

comments.content: Yup. It was a globbing problem in hudson - this one is now fixed and it should be fixed moving forward.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mordred
